Uh
Not too sure what to write here so heres a recipe for Pancakes instead

Ingredients:
1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
3 tablespoons sugar
1 tablespoon baking powder
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/8 teaspoon freshly ground nutmeg
2 large eggs, at room temperature
1 1/4 cups milk, at room temperature
1/2 teaspoon pure vanilla extract
3 tablespoons unsalted butter, plus more as needed

Now to make it
1. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and nutmeg.
2. In another bowl, beat the eggs and then whisk in the milk and vanilla.
3. Melt the butter in a large cast iron skillet or griddle over medium heat.
4. Whisk the butter into the milk mixture. Add the wet ingredients to the flour mixture, and whisk until a thick batter is just formed
5. Keeping the skillet at medium heat, ladle about 1/4 cup of the batter onto the skillet, to make a pancake. Make 1 or 2 more pancakes, taking care to keep them evenly spaced apart. Cook, until bubbles break the surface of the pancakes, and the undersides are golden brown, about 2 minutes. Flip with a spatula and cook about 1 minute more on the second side. Serve immediately or transfer to a platter and cover loosely with foil to keep warm. Repeat with the remaining batter, adding more butter to the skillet as needed.
6. Procedure for adding fruit to pancakes: Once the bubbles break the surface of the pancakes, scatter the surface with sliced or diced fruit, or chocolate chips, nuts, etc. Flip with a spatula and cook for 1 minute more, being careful not to burn toppings.

Brilliant story, GLaDOS is one of the best video game character of all time

Portal 2 is pretty much, one of the best sequel games Valve has made over the years. It has brought a story that draws you closer to the main protagonist Chell and the Semi-Antagonist GLaDoS. As you progress though the game's storyline and its unique puzzles that require you to use the Mobile Portal Device dubbed the Portal Gun to, basically, portal through walls to get to the end;  the relationship between human and Robotic A.I. becomes a very almost mature storyline for a game for anyone in the family (including grandma). So after playing this amazing game, I'm giving it 10/10 stars
Tha Bomb!

Excelente continuación de Portal, pero con identidad y una atmósfera al nivel de HL2, con el humor de Aperture Science, Glados y Whitley.. puzzles inteligentes, desafiantes y divertidos, diseñados de una manera que que te exigen, pero no están hecho para frustrarte, tampoco son fáciles, pero están hechos de tal manera que los disfrutas, ademas las secciones de no pruebas, son muy satisfactorias, la historia se desarrolla de manera fluida y correcta, la verdad no hay mucho mas que decir, es un juego redondo en todo aspecto, no encuentro nada negativo, diversión jugable, humor, atmósfera absorbente... que mas quieres? Uno de los grandes de la industria, para siempre
10/10, a must play. Fun. Funny. Enjoyable. Well-paced. Clever. It's just awesome.
A lot more challenging, great story, and loved all the jokes!

Итак когда я прошел всю игру полностью и одиночную игру и кооп: я хотел бы написать обзор на эту игру.

Итак начну  пожалуй с плюсов 

1)Это карты пользователей - Они могут быть созданы как и  школьником так и человеком который продумывает всё в своей камере тратя на это где то 1-3 часа но его старания все равно не пройдут даром так как люди будут проходить его карту и оценивать, говорить недостатки, баги карты

2)Это редактор (режим создания карт) карт - В нем все достаточно просто не нужно использовать какие-то гайды что бы разобраться что тут да и как.

3)Кампания - Она пригледелась мне тем что там подробно раскрываются как и злодеи данной игры так и Добрые. Кампания разделена на 2 части в которых подробно раскрываются такие персонажи как GLaDOS так и Wheatly.

4)Кооперативный режим - Мне он пригледелся тем что в нем можно как играть в компанию, так и в пользовательские карты с другом. Можно над ним и поприкалываться там. 

5)Это сам стиль игры - Он показывает нам будующее человечества глазами Chell (Чел и да так зовут главную героиню игры.)

Думаю с плюсами я закончил 

Итак что я могу внести к минусам данной игры

1)Это сложность игры - Иногда Portal это легкая игра, но она может подходить не всем. Если вы не очень смышленны то не начинайте даже играть в эту игру.

2)Однотипность уровней - Поставил портал туда сюду, поставил куб туда и туда. Вчсе дверь открыта идешь на следующий уровень а там все также.

3)Когда вы пройдете полностью игру (Компанию за Чел и Ко-оп компанию), то вам станет скучно как я и сказал сверху из-за однотипностей уровней.

Ну вроде все я высказал свое мнение, только вам решать по моему отзыву или по отзыву других покупать эту игру или нет.

This is a PC classic that helped revolutionize games on the PC platform.

A puzzle game that requires understanding of a simple concept: Portals.
You shoot one portal and another portal somewhere else then you walk through the portals to wherever the portal leads.

Of course, there are more mechanics introduced later in the game that increases difficulty and requires more thinking on your part such as gel that makes you jump or run faster.

Not only do I adore the puzzle gameplay of Portal 2, but I will always love the songs that you'll be rewarded with once you finish the main story.

Get this game on sale.

Probably one of the most entertaining and fun games I have ever played. I love Cave Johnson's prerecorded messages and how they evolve as you progress through the different eras of the test chambers, and Wheatley is hilarious. Game itself is way better than the original, and the original was epic. I strongly suggest this game to anyone who likes to use their brain to win, instead of just shooting your way through everything

Fantastic game. You know this already. I was surprised with how long this game is, I thought it would be a game I would beat in a day but I was wrong, also theres hundreds of great community made levels and co op mode with whole new puzzles even after you beat single player.

Singleplayer is brought on a whole now level, apart from original Portal...new features like speed and bounce gel, excursion funnels and such make gameplay diverse as it is. Story is getting developed parrarel with Half-Life with bunch of easter eggs. Fun in co-operative mode is uncountable, specialy with friend (whether you are trolling or testing others brain). Community test chambers makes it even more interesting, and Mods know as Paint Gun Initiative and Thinking with Time-Machine is prove what community can do.

Hope this helps you out, at and of co-op campaign it is really satisfying, so try it out - stick till the end! ;)
great game to play with friends

The original Portal is considered by many "a perfect game". You don't need to known how to play, what's the story, who is your caracter, you simply play and everything appears in front of you in the most perfect way a game can achieve. Then, Valve release Portal 2, and you find out no matter how perfect the original Portal was, you can always find a way to enhance the experience.
Portal 2 have the same mechanic of Portal, but the story, the enviroment and even the gameplay itself is so aditive and so well balanced that you beleve everybody should play this game.
Portal stablish a hole new genre of game and Portal 2 bring this genre to a brand new level of excelence. And if you don't know what is Portal, perfect! Buy the game and find out. Problably it will be the best experience you could have with a game.

[h1]One of the best games I've ever played - seriously[/h1]

For conservative people, [b]Portal 2[/b] may seem like a stupid idea: [i]how the hell can a game that only consists in shooting portals be fun in any way?[/i] PLEASE - Portal 2 is a masterpiece of creativity, puzzles and level design!

Very few games force your head to think like Portal 2, with some of the best puzzles you'll ever see. Not to mention the story behind the game, which I strongly advise you to go look after it on the internet to see how deep things get in Portal's universe.

I couldn't recommend this game enough, so I just give it a "thumbs up" and GO PLAY IT if you haven't already done it.

I played through the single player campaign several years ago. Loved it.
I just picked up a new copy and started in on the co-op missions with my girl.
We're loving it. And though she is very new to first-person games (maybe only Skyrim besides?) she took to it very quickly and enjoys both the co-op, and her own single player.
I'd recommend this game to anyone who enjoys puzzle games, or games with witty banter. This has both in spades.

О такой игре как portal можно рассказывать очень долго, но я раскажу вкратце. С начала хотелось бы сказать что такие игры как portal я полюбил в первую очередь за атмасферу загадочности и одиночества.Того и гляди сойдеш с ума когда единственные кто с тобой говорят два компьютера, один из которых хочет тебя убить.На моей памяти нет вообще ни одной плохой игры от valve(мое личное мнение).

Во-вторых: Glados!) по мне так это одна из самых харизматичных злодеек из всех игр (мое личное мнение).

И последнее: турели!) ну как можно их не любить.По мне так они одни из не многих кто со мной здороваются).

На последок хочу сказать что побольше-бы мне видеть таких игр)

呃 ，结局有些泪目，忽然从敌人变成唱歌送你离开的“小天使”。还蛮好听的。认真的看完结局，认真的做了截图，认真的有点。。回想起来主角的经历，那扇门狠狠地关上的时候，真有点失落，没有敌人的失落吗。。。然而此刻，阳光明媚，金色稻田里升腾起的热气温暖舒服，宽广的世界里，你自由了，自由了！最后的歌曲蛮好听，词也很有意思。请多支持！
